name: Nekros Undead Avenger (demo)
description:
Nekros is a Metroidvania game,ispired by Hollow Knight and Symphony of the Night.

Lucas is a warrior of light,when he returns home from his mission he finds his home in flames, Lutum his old friend now turned Undead Arch Necromancer is the responsable.

Thats the the story sum up for the demo,we are looking for feedback,its a short demo,but we are already looking for feedback and beta testers.

Also please hit me up on Twitter at Rommel_Omi

Or send an email to: irongiantgames@gmail.com
